title: Average regular season home attendance of the Tennessee Titans 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Average attendance has fallen over the Year.

Average attendance is roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, gradually decreasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Average attendance, of value 69143.0 was reached at Year 2012,  2013, and 2014
The lowest Average attendance, of value 62304.0 was reported at Year 2015
